title.en: A Child and a King of Peace

en: God promises a ruler who brings lasting peace.
Hope is attached to a person, not an idea.

lines: Isaiah speaks to people living in fear and oppression.
He promises light and joy from God.
A child will be born; authority will rest on him.
His rule will bring justice and peace without end.

question.en: Why might God choose to bring His rule through a child?
